title: Marketing Resources (MRM)
fullText:
--- product: campaign title: Marketing Resources (MRM) description: Marketing Resources (MRM) feature: Workflows, Targeting Activity --- # Marketing Resources (MRM){#marketing-resources-mrm} The workflows detailed below are installed with the **Marketing resources (MRM)** module by default. For more on this module, refer to this [section](../../campaign/using/designing-marketing-campaigns.md).
Label
 Internal name
 Description
Marketing resource notifications
assetMgt
This workflow manages notifications linked to the approval and publication of marketing resources.
Task notification
taskMgt
This workflow lets you send notification messages related to tasks in marketing campaigns.
Discussion forum processes
newsgroupMgt
This workflow manages the delivery of notifications from discussion forums. It is triggered when an approval signal is received.
